mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, user_id, product_id, cart_count , product_price, product_option) VALUES (cart_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{cartCount}, #{productPrice}, #{productOption})
mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_price AS productPrice, c.cart_count AS cartCount, c.cart_id AS cartId , c.product_option AS productOption , p.category_id AS productCategory , p.discount , p.product_stock AS productStock FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cart_count = #{cartCount} WHERE cart_id = #{cartId}
